Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Decks

Class DevelopmentDeck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Decks.DevelopmentDeck
public class DevelopmentDeck
extends java.lang.Object
this class represents a deck of DevelopmentCards. The cards are split by level and color It gives the method to create and extract the cards from the deck.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    DevelopmentDeck​(java.lang.String file)
    the constructor of the class creates the decks that will be used during the game

  • Constructor Details

    • DevelopmentDeck

      public DevelopmentDeck​(java.lang.String file)
      the constructor of the class creates the decks that will be used during the game
      Parameters:
      file - is the name of the file that contains the characteristics of the DevelopmentCards

  • Method Details

    • extract

      public java.util.LinkedList<DevelopmentCard> extract​(int num, CardColor color) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      This method extract the top cards of the a deck
      Parameters:
      num - is the number of cards to be extracted
      color - is the color of the extracted cards
      Returns:
      the extracted cards
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the target deck does not exist

    • readTop

      public DevelopmentCard readTop​(CardColor color, int level) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      This method reads the top element of a deck of cards. It does not extract that element.
      Parameters:
      color - is the color of the cards in the deck
      level - is the level of the cards in the deck
      Returns:
      a copy of the top card in the deck
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the deck is empty or does not exist

    • getTop

      public DevelopmentCard getTop​(CardColor color, int level) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      This method reads the top element of a deck of cards. It extracts that element.
      Parameters:
      color - is the color of the cards in the deck
      level - is the level of the cards in the deck
      Returns:
      the top card in the deck
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the deck is empty or does not exist

    • getNumber

      public int getNumber​(CardColor color, int level)
      Given a color and a level, this method returns the number of cards corresponding
      Parameters:
      color - is the color of the cards in the deck
      level - is the level of the cards in the deck
      Returns:
      returns the number of cards corresponding to the color and level specified

    • isColorAvailable

      public boolean isColorAvailable​(CardColor cardColor)
      Parameters:
      cardColor - indicates one of the colors of the DevelopmentCards
      Returns:
      returns false if all the DevelopmentCards of the selected color have been eliminated, true otherwise

    • showDeck

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> showDeck()
      Returns:
      Map of (Integer,String) which represents the cards on the top of all the decks
